column5: anyone have any info on paquettes camp?
I don't , but i am curious . With a good name like that i want to say its got to be east of Ontario ???????
Good luck, I suspect you'll need it.  'Course your expectations and needs may be different than mine.

Is this the same Paquettes Camp that is just a little North West of Chapleau? Maybe 15 miles down the fire road from town. We passed it every year on our way into Happy Days on Windermere. This was back in the late 70's early 80's. It had a pretty good reputation at that time and looked like most of the buildings were in good shape. However I can not tell you what the fishing was like or what shape the camp is in now.  Good luck.

it's the place on the way to Happy Day/ Windermere never fished it but I'm not a big fan of those Chapleau area lakes, especially the smaller ones if your adventurous, look at a map, and continue into the logging roads past the camp to explore other lakes
